title: Ford Microcat 05 2011
description:
The title says it all.

Details:

2010.12 version + update 2011.05 (it's from July 2011, active afaik till July 2012)


Wat do?
1) download
2) unpack
3) mount image, install
4) don't start, apply the update
5) ???
6) profit

After first start-up it'll require to create user/password - 1 letter is enough, and I advise to use something like a/a, cause you'll have to enter it after every app start.

May require to enter discounts (just press repeatedly tab+0 on that screen till every cell fills with zeros and punch "ok" - it'll be enough)

It can start as a Russian version, so just change the language from the list in the upper left corner to anything (literally) and then, when you finally see something that doesn't look like chinese crap (unless you have a Cyrylic fonts installed), choose desired language. App will start in Ru, but after user/pass screen it'll change to the chosen language.
